title: Docker Build Executor
description: Executor for building Docker images using Docker CLI.

registry.description: Docker registry base URL. If not provided, the PORTFOLIO_DOCKER_REGISTRY environment variable will be used.

buildArgs.description: Build arguments to pass to the Docker build command

pushToRegistry.description: Push the built image to the Docker registry after a successful build

skipLogin.description: Skip login to the Docker registry when pushing. Useful for CI/CD or development environments since the user should already be authenticated.
